extension.name: Google Groups Integration
extension.comments: Original extension (uk.co.vedaconsulting.googlegroup) development by Veda NFP Consulting Ltd (https://vedaconsulting.co.uk/) supporting CiviCRM versions upto v4.6. Rewrite for CiviCRM v5.x funded by Greenleaf Advancement (https://greenleafadvancement.com) and Joshua Gowans (https://civicrm.org), developed by Deepak Srivastava (https://mountev.co.uk).
